text: allāhvaip paṟṟi keṭṭa eṇṇam eṇṇum muṉāḥpikkāṉa āṇkaḷaiyum, muṉāḥpikkāṉa peṇkaḷaiyum, iṇaivaittu vaṇaṅkum āṇkaḷaiyum, iṇaivaittu vaṇaṅkum peṇkaḷaiyum, (allāh) vētaṉai ceyvāṉ. (Avvētaṇaiyiṉ) kēṭu avarkaḷ mēl cūḻantu koṇṭu irukkiṟatu iṉṉum allāh avarkaḷ mītu kōpam koṇṭāṉ; avarkaḷaic capittum viṭṭāṉ; avarkaḷukkāka narakattaiyum cittam ceytirukkiṉṟāṉ - (atutāṉ) cellumiṭaṅkaḷil mikavum keṭṭatu
